unnormalised: ## New Wheels are Here, Yaar! Auto Launches You Can't Miss!
normalised: New Wheels are Here, Yaar! Auto Launches You Can't Miss!

unnormalised: Namaste folks! The Indian auto scene is buzzing like a Delhi market right now. So many new vehicles rolling out, it's hard to keep track! Let's dive into the freshest launches that are making waves, from budget-friendly hatchbacks to SUVs that can conquer Ladakh.
normalised: Namaste folks! The Indian auto scene is buzzing like a Delhi market right now. So many new vehicles rolling out, it's hard to keep track! Let's dive into the freshest launches that are making waves, from budget-friendly hatchbacks to S U V s that can conquer Ladakh.

unnormalised: First up, we have the Maruti Suzuki Alto 800's successor (name still under wraps!). Expected to be a game-changer in the entry-level segment, promising better mileage than your chacha's old scooter. Leaks suggest it'll be priced competitively, probably around Rs. 4 lakhs ex-showroom.
normalised: First up, we have the Maruti Suzuki Alto eight hundred's successor name still under wraps! Expected to be a game-changer in the entry-level segment, promising better mileage than your chacha's old scooter. Leaks suggest it'll be priced competitively, probably around rupee four lakhs ex-showroom.

unnormalised: Then there's Mahindra's new XUV700 variant, allegedly packing even more tech than before. Think ADAS level 3, a massive infotainment screen that probably covers half the dashboard, and maybe even self-parking (perfect for navigating chaotic Mumbai traffic!).
normalised: Then there's Mahindra's new X U V seven hundred variant, allegedly packing even more tech than before. Think A D A S level three, a massive infotainment screen that probably covers half the dashboard, and maybe even self-parking perfect for navigating chaotic Mumbai traffic!

unnormalised: For the EV enthusiasts, Tata Motors has unveiled the Nexon EV facelift. More range, sleeker design, and faster charging – sounds like a winner! Range is bumped up to 450 km, addressing the biggest concern people had with electric vehicles.
normalised: For the E V enthusiasts, Tata Motors has unveiled the Nexon E V facelift. More range, sleeker design, and faster charging sounds like a winner! Range is bumped up to four hundred and fifty kilometer, addressing the biggest concern people had with electric vehicles.

unnormalised: And not to forget the Royal Enfield Himalayan 450! Adventure junkies, rejoice! This beauty is ready to take you from the Himalayas to Kanyakumari. Expect improved performance and off-road capabilities, making it a true beast.
normalised: And not to forget the Royal Enfield Himalayan four hundred and fifty! Adventure junkies, rejoice! This beauty is ready to take you from the Himalayas to Kanyakumari. Expect improved performance and off-road capabilities, making it a true beast.

unnormalised: Don’t miss the Hyundai Creta facelift either, with a revised front fascia and a more premium interior. It will likely be showcased at the Auto Expo 2024, so mark your calendars!
normalised: Don't miss the Hyundai Creta facelift either, with a revised front fascia and a more premium interior. It will likely be showcased at the Auto Expo two thousand and twenty four, so mark your calendars!

unnormalised: Rumours also suggest MG is gearing up to launch a new compact SUV, possibly undercutting the competition with an aggressive price tag. Speculations are rife that it will have a panoramic sunroof spanning almost 50 sq ft!
normalised: Rumours also suggest M G is gearing up to launch a new compact S U V, possibly undercutting the competition with an aggressive price tag. Speculations are rife that it will have a panoramic sunroof spanning almost fifty square feet!

unnormalised: Remember to check with your local dealer for accurate pricing and availability. Dr. Sharma at Autocar India says these prices are preliminary and could change!
normalised: Remember to check with your local dealer for accurate pricing and availability. Doctor Sharma at Autocar India says these prices are preliminary and could change!

unnormalised: Stay tuned for more updates and happy driving, my friends!
normalised: Stay tuned for more updates and happy driving, my friends!
